title: Navigate to an unchecked checkbox in reading mode
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the unchecked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate to an unchecked checkbox in interaction mode
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the unchecked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate to an unchecked checkbox
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the unchecked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate to a checked checkbox in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Mark the first checkbox as checked
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate to a checked checkbox in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Mark the first checkbox as checked
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate to a checked checkbox
setupScriptDescription: Mark the first checkbox as checked
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

title: Operate a checkbox in reading mode
instructions: Check and uncheck the first checkbox.

title: Operate a checkbox in interaction mode
instructions: Check and uncheck the first checkbox.

title: Operate a checkbox
instructions: Check and uncheck the first checkbox.

title: Read an unchecked checkbox in reading mode.
setupScriptDescription: Put DOM focus on the first checkbox
instructions: When the reading cursor is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox
assertion3: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Read an unchecked checkbox in interaction mode.
setupScriptDescription: Put DOM focus on the first checkbox
instructions: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox
assertion3: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Read an unchecked checkbox
setupScriptDescription: Put DOM focus on the first checkbox
instructions: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox
assertion3: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Read a checked checkbox in reading mode.
instructions: When the reading cursor is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox ( checked) is conveyed

title: Read a checked checkbox in interaction mode.
instructions: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

title: Read a checked checkbox
instructions: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

title: Read grouping information of a grouped checkbox in reading mode
instructions: When reading cursor is on a checkbox, read its grouping information

title: Read grouping information of a grouped checkbox in interaction mode
instructions: When focus is on a checkbox, read its grouping information

title: Read grouping information of a grouped checkbox
instructions: When focus is on a checkbox, read its grouping information

title: Navigate sequentially through a checkbox group in reading mode
instructions: Navigate both forward and backward into and out of  the checkbox group.
assertion3: Group boundaries at start and end of group are conveyed

title: Navigate sequentially through a checkbox group
instructions: Navigate both forward and backward into and out of  the checkbox group.
assertion3: Group boundaries at start and end of group are conveyed

title: Navigate into a checkbox group in reading mode
instructions: Navigate from outside the checkbox group to a checkbox inside the group. Test both navigating forward into the start and backward into the end.
assertion3: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate into a checkbox group in interaction mode
instructions: Navigate from outside the checkbox group to a checkbox inside the group. Test both navigating forward into the start and backward into the end.
assertion3: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate into a checkbox group
instructions: Navigate from outside the checkbox group to a checkbox inside the group. Test both navigating forward into the start and backward into the end.
assertion3: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate out of a checkbox group  in reading mode
instructions: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
assertion3: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate out of a checkbox group in interaction mode
instructions: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
assertion3: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate out of a checkbox group
instructions: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
assertion3: 2:The group boundary is conveyed
